# tpc-client

A TCP Client for Node.js (non promised)

## Install

```
$ npm install tcp-client --save
```
## Log
  The Module save every TCP-Request and TCP-response send to the Server.
## Usage

``` js
var tcpClient= require('tcp-client')

var options ={}
options.ip= 'YOUR_IP_SERVER'    //192.168.xxx.xxx
options.port= 'YOUR_IP_SERVER'  //6777
options.timeout='YOUR_TIMEOUT'  //5000 => 5seg

var client = tcpClient.createClient(options)

client.request(tramaEnvio,function (err, response) {
  // do something with response
})
